text:
.dsp and .mak files both look for apr_iconv.h which is not present in both the
tar.Z or the tar.gz distrib files.
creator: apache.org-bugzilla@dale.us
nd@perlig.de
text:
That is normal. When the Win32 distribution is ready, a zip archive with full
source code will be provided.

Closing this issue now; feel free to re-open it if you encounter any further issues. Thanks for using 
Apache!
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
